introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy describes how FF Sensitivities collects, uses, and shares your information when you use our services.

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic.description: When you use our service, we automatically collect certain information, including:

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share aggregated, non-personal information for analytical purposes.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our support channels.
